Posts.Content: slg91324 wrote: I found a lump about a month ago.  I was fully expecting that once the doctor felt it, he would tell me that it was nothing to worry about.  Instead he scheduled me with a mammo and a consult with a surgeon.  Went for the mammo last week and he called the next day to say that I needed to go in for a compression analysis and that when I met with the surgeon on Monday he would probably do a biopsy.  After the first appointment I was a mess.  After a lot of research, I know that the statistics are still in my favor, but I have too many friends who had the same low risk history as me and who had cancer.  Thankfully, they are all healthy today. I go back and forth between being totally fixated on what if, trying not to let myself think bad thoughts and having faith that if I get a diagnosis, it will just be the next curve in the road. I guess tonight, I just feel a little alone.  I am not worried about tomorrow in and of itself.  But I am worried about being thrust into the hands of a series of strangers who I don't trust to give me the information I need.  The waiting sucks, the impersonalization sucks and the thought that this might be just the beginning really sucks. Anyway, Ladies thank you for being a non-judgemental sounding board. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Compression Mammo Tomorrow slg91324 Lisa1962

Posts.Content: Feb 21, 2010 04:30PM slg91324 wrote: Ladies: I want to thank you for the advice and support.  I did take a piece of paper with me.  It listed both of your names first and then all of the others in my life who love and support me.  I did not feel alone on Thursday.  Thank you.  I had a compression analysis and ultra sound on Thursday.  I see the surgeon on Monday and will keep you posted then also.  Thank you, thank you, thank you.
Posts.Title: Compression Mammo Tomorrow slg91324 Lisa1962

Posts.Content: Feb 23, 2010 10:36AM slg91324 wrote: Thanks for the support everyone.  I just got back from the BS.  No need for a biopsy!  Blessings, blessings, blessings.  Thanks everyone!
Posts.Title: Compression Mammo Tomorrow slg91324 Lisa1962
